subject: Umpires
Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
World Series
lead_paragraph: Mr. Vargo worked in the National League from 1960 to 1983, including four World Series and four All-Star games. He was behind the plate for both Sandy Koufax’s no-hitter and his perfect game.
snippet: Mr. Vargo worked in the National League from 1960 to 1983, including four World Series and four All-Star games. He was behind the plate for both Sandy Koufax’s no-hitter and his perfect game.
